stanza.line: Some say thy fault is youth some wantonnesswantonness
Some say thy grace is youth and gentle sportsport
Both grace and faults are loved of more and lessless
Thou mak faults graces that to thee resortresort
As on the finger of a throned queenqueen
The basest jewel will be well esteemedesteemed
So are those errors that in thee are seenseen
To truths translated and for true things deemeddeemed
How many lambs might the stern wolf betraybetray
If like a lamb he could his looks translatetranslate
How many gazers mightst thou lead awayaway
if thou wouldst use the strength of all thy statestate
But do not so I love thee in such sortsort
As thou being mine mine is thy good reportreport
